MatchedRegion.transcript: Meanwhile, most hospital staff interact with the EHR database using predefined rule conversion systems.
This means extending or modifying the systems requires special training, and this is a major bottleneck for them to freely use the database.
One alternative way is to build a system that can directly translate a natural language question into an SQL query.
With this system, the users can simply type or verbally ask their questions, and the system will return the answers from the database.
Imagine an AI speaker that answers questions on hospital data.
This will unleash the potential of EHR data, and anyone in the healthcare industry can easily access the information they want.
